      • getOrderByWithAlias

        public String getOrderByWithAlias(String alias,
                         String orderBy)
        Normalize a order by. Example: @OrderBy(value = "descricao, id DESC") With alias "c" should be ORDER BY c.descricao, c.id DESC
        Parameters:
        alias -
        orderBy -
        Returns:
